data.author: Nishant Shekhar
data.description: Radamel Falcao is making Monaco fans forget Kylian Mbappeâ€™s departure from the French champion. The Colombian striker added two more goals to his impressive tally this season as Monaco heaped more misery on struggling Lille with a 4-0 win at the northern club in the French league on Friday.
data.title: Radamel Falcao in top form as Monaco move level on points with PSG
